meanings.definition: A council or governing body in Spanish-speaking countries.
meanings.sent1: The cabildos made important decisions for the community.
meanings.sent2: The cabildos met regularly to discuss local issues.
meanings.sent3: The cabildos had a meeting to decide on the upcoming festival.
meanings.sent4: The cabildos' unity was as strong as a fortress.
meanings.sent5: The cabildos' role was crucial in maintaining order in the town.

meanings.definition: A building or group of buildings used for meetings or administrative purposes.
meanings.sent1: The cabildos building was renovated last year.
meanings.sent2: Let's meet at the cabildos for the town hall meeting.
meanings.sent3: The cabildos building had a unique architecture.
meanings.sent4: The cabildos stood tall in the center of the town like a beacon.
meanings.sent5: The cabildos' grandeur was unmatched in the region.
